name: Aeos Cookie
description1: When you score a goal, your maximum HP is raised for the rest of the match. (This bonus caps at 6 stacks)

name: Assault Vest
description1: Gain a shield against Sp. Attack damage while out of combat. (8s after leaving combat)

name: Attack Weight
description1: When you score a goal, your Attack is raised for the rest of the match. (This bonus caps at 6 stacks)

name: Buddy Barrier
description1: Grant a shield to you and a nearby ally Pokémon with the lowest HP when using your Unite Move. (5s duration)

name: Energy Amplifier
description1: After using your Unite move, deal increased damage for a short time. (4s duration)

name: Exp Share
description1: Increases the Pokémon's Passive Exp. Point gain while it has the fewest Exp. Points on its team. In addition, when a nearby teammate defeats a wild Pokémon that teammate gains slightly more Exp. Points.

name: Float Stone
description1: Increases movement speed while out of combat. (8s after leaving combat)

name: Focus Band
description1: When dropping to low HP, recover HP lost each second for 3s. (90s cooldown)

name: Leftovers
description1: Recovers health over time while out of combat. (8s after leaving combat)

name: Muscle Band
description1: Deal additional damage with basic attacks based on the target's remaining HP.

name: Rocky Helmet
description1: After absorbing enough damage, deal percent damage based on your max HP to nearby opponents. (2s cooldown - 10% HP damage trigger in a single attack)

name: Scope Lens
description1: Increases the damage of basic attack critical hits. The higher your Attack, the more the damage is increased. (1s cooldown)

name: Score Shield
description1: Shields you while you attempt to score a goal. Scoring cannot be interrupted while the shield remains active. (6s cooldown)

name: Shell Bell
description1: Recover HP when successfully landing a move. The higher your Sp. Attack, the more HP recovered. (10s Cooldown)

name: Special Attack Specs
description1: When you score a goal, your Sp. Attack is raised for the rest of the match. (This bonus caps at 6 stacks)
